section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Electronic product" means a product covered by EPEAT or another comprehensive environmental rating system approved by the Department of Information Technology.
"EPEAT" means the Electronic Product Environmental Assessment Tool.

text.section:
When purchasing an electronic product to be used by the State, a State unit shall purchase an electronic product that:
is listed and rated silver or gold on the EPEAT registry; or
meets nationally recognized and consensus-based standards established by a comprehensive environmental rating system approved by the Department of Information Technology.
If a unit requests a waiver from the requirement in subsection (b) of this section, the Secretary of Information Technology, or the Secretary's designee, may waive the requirement.
